Sentencas: An easy-to-approach and comprehensive mathematical model for planar type solid oxide fuel cells is presented in the current work.
Titulo: An easy-to-approach and comprehensive model for planar type SOFCs

Sentencas: It provides a tool for researchers to conduct parametric studies with less-intensive computation in order to gasp the fundamentals of coupled mass transfer, electrochemical reaction, and current conduction in a fuel cell.
Titulo: An easy-to-approach and comprehensive model for planar type SOFCs

Sentencas: In the model, the analysis for the mass transfer polarization at a known average fuel cell operating temperature is based on an average mass transfer model analogous to an average heat transfer process in a duct flow.
Titulo: An easy-to-approach and comprehensive model for planar type SOFCs

Sentencas: The effect of the species' partial pressure at electrode/electrolyte interfaces is therefore included in the exchange current density for activation polarizations.
Titulo: An easy-to-approach and comprehensive model for planar type SOFCs

Sentencas: An electrical circuit for the current and ion conduction is used to analyze the ohmic losses from anode current collector to cathode current collector.
Titulo: An easy-to-approach and comprehensive model for planar type SOFCs

Sentencas: The three types of over-potentials caused by different polarizations in a planar type solid oxide fuel cell can be identified and compared.
Titulo: An easy-to-approach and comprehensive model for planar type SOFCs

Sentencas: The effects of species concentrations, properties of fuel cell components to the voltage-current performance of a fuel cell at different operating conditions are studied.
Titulo: An easy-to-approach and comprehensive model for planar type SOFCs

Sentencas: Optimization of the dimensions of flow channels and current-collecting ribs is also presented.
Titulo: An easy-to-approach and comprehensive model for planar type SOFCs

Sentencas: The model is of significance to the design and optimization of solid oxide fuel cells for industrial application.
Titulo: An easy-to-approach and comprehensive model for planar type SOFCs
